Blade from the Mist.name: Blade from the Mist
Blade from the Mist.fullText:
Obsidian Stalker Attack 11Blade from the Mist

You step into sight as you attack, catching your foe unprepared for your assault.

Encounter        Shadow, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target couldn’t see you at the start of your turn, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Effect: Before or after the attack, you shift your speed, and you gain phasing during the shift.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 32.
Blade from the Mist.flavor: You step into sight as you attack, catching your foe unprepared for your assault.
Blade from the Mist.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target couldn’t see you at the start of your turn, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Blade from the Mist.effect: Before or after the attack, you shift your speed, and you gain phasing during the shift.

Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.name: Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb
Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.fullText:
Obsidian Stalker Attack 20Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb

Shadows grasp and pull at the target, holding it in place as you prepare to deliver the final blow.

Daily        Shadow, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One enemy

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: [4W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The target is immobilized and cannot teleport (save ends both). In addition, you use your assassin’s shroud up to four times against the target.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 32.
Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.flavor: Shadows grasp and pull at the target, holding it in place as you prepare to deliver the final blow.
Grasp of the Obsidian Tomb.effect: The target is immobilized and cannot teleport (save ends both). In addition, you use your assassin’s shroud up to four times against the target.

Hunter's Eye.name: Hunter's Eye
Hunter's Eye.fullText:
Obsidian Stalker Utility 12Hunter's Eye

Once you have chosen a foe, it cannot escape you.

Daily        Shadow
Minor Action      Ranged 10

Target: Your assassin’s shroud target

Effect: Until you use this power on a different enemy, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and you can take a standard action to determine the distance and direction to the target, ignoring all barriers. If the target is on a different plane from you, you know which plane but gain no other information about the target’s location.


Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 32.
Hunter's Eye.flavor: Once you have chosen a foe, it cannot escape you.
Hunter's Eye.effect: Until you use this power on a different enemy, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target, and you can take a standard action to determine the distance and direction to the target, ignoring all barriers. If the target is on a different plane from you, you know which plane but gain no other information about the target’s location.
